snippet: The girls’ mother told detectives she had left her apartment to get ice cream for the older daughter and then to attend to her laundry.
abstract: Police and fire officials say fire in public housing project in Bronx that left sisters Amanda and Jannubi Jabie dead was started by incense.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and NOAH REMNICK

lead_paragraph: The girls’ mother told detectives she had left her apartment to get ice cream for the older daughter and then to attend to her laundry.

headline.main: Incense Ignited Bronx Fire That Killed 2 Girls, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Incense Cited as Cause of Blaze That Killed 2 Sisters
